title: Ticket Response
body: Why are ticket response times so slow? I can understand a long time ago when the support team was limited, but now RIOT is a huge game that should have many employees, especially a large support team! So why does it still take so long?

replies.body:
We've had a lot of ticket requests recently, so response times are a bit longer than normal. Our specialists are working their butts off, so sit tight while we get to you. :)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
